title: T206 Jack Chesbro Printer Scrap Reverse Color Error
author: Maculay1979

posts.post_title: T206 Jack Chesbro Printer Scrap Reverse Color Error
posts.post_content: Hello - I am new to the board.  This card was purchased by me from Pete Gustafson (he can verify) last October.  Believe Pete is a member here.  I just reached out to him a few days ago to see if he knew of anyone interested since this was a unique item.  Unfortunately due to a death in the family I am trying to unload a few items to help my mother in law which is the only reason I am selling.  Asking $1400 but will consider all offers.  Also have this listed on ebay and have great feedback on there if you prefer the safety of the bay.  Thanks for looking.

Nice card and 100% printers scrap.  There were several found in one large collection, with one other having the yellow ink on the revers.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/tshedmW.jpg[/img]
Thank you for the additional verification
Willing to consider reasonable offers.  Also may do part cash part trade.
